name: OtinsOdyssey
description:
OtinsOdyssey is a 2d shooting game .Its a top down shooter game with hero and some aliens. This game is created by a beginner, so if you have any suggestion or complaints or anyone want to develop more games with me contact me on benitomathew19@gmail.com . Hope everyone like this game. 

Thank you by the CEO of Otinstudio
